description: Sets of n distinct primes p_i in ascending order, written as triangle, such that S_n = Sum_{k=1..n} p_k is minimized and that there exists a compensation set of n primes q_j with q_j = n*p_j - Sum_{k=1..n,k!=j} p_k, j=1..n such that the set union {p_j} U {q_j} contains 2*n distinct primes and Sum_{k=1..n} q_k = S_n.
